text: Jean Garon (May 6, 1938 - July 1, 2014) was a Canadian politician, lawyer, academic and economist. He was a member of the Parti Québécois. He was Minister of Agriculture and Education, Quebec MNA from 1976 until 1985. He was also Mayor of Lévis from 1998 until 2005. Garon was born in Saint-Michel, Quebec. He graduated from Université Laval in 1960. Garon died on July 1, 2014 in Quebec City, aged 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * Jean Garon at the National Assembly of Quebec Category:1938 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Academics of Université Laval Category:Canadian lawyers Category:Canadian mayors Category:Canadian economists Category:Politicians from Quebec City
title: Jean Garon
